alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher; Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 02 at 5:32PM CDT until May 02 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Logan County in central Oklahoma... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 532 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported flash flooding in Kingfisher . Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, El Reno, Kingfisher, Piedmont, Hennessey, Okarche, Cashion, Calumet, Dover, Loyal, Concho, Omega and Cedar Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 109 and 123. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
